title: Nigeria’s top banks collaborate on new cNGN stablecoin
description:
The cNGN serves as a complement, not a substitute, for the eNaira. Unlike the eNaira, created by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) with broader capabilities, the cNGN is overseen by a consortium involving Nigerian banks.

Principal Nigerian banks are collaborating to create and oversee the cNGN stablecoin, a novel digital currency designed to bring advantages to both token-holders and the Nigerian economy.

According to sources from within the project who prefer to remain anonymous, The cNGN token is entirely supported, ensuring a direct correlation with each Naira (N1) held by these leading banks.

Similar to popular stablecoins, the cNGN offers interoperability with various public blockchains, facilitating effortless global transfers and broadening its use internationally.

Read more

title: Coinbase Expands European Footprint With Approval to Operate in France
description: Crypto exchange Coinbase has received approval as a registered virtual asset service provider in France. “This registration allows Coinbase to operate in France, continuing our plans to grow across Europe,” the crypto platform detailed. “France is an important market for Coinbase … We are dedicated to partnering with high-bar regulators across jurisdictions to help update […]

title: Bulgaria Clears Crypto Lender Nexo of Criminal Allegations After Extensive Investigation
description: The Prosecutor’s Office of the Republic of Bulgaria recently concluded a significant investigation into Nexo, a prominent cryptocurrency lending firm. The investigation, which scrutinized the company’s operations from 2018 to January 2023, focused on allegations of money laundering, tax crimes, computer fraud, and involvement in an organized criminal group. title: Hashdex Names BitGo as Bitcoin ETF Custodian in Amended Application
description:
Hashdex has updated its Bitcoin ETF filing, naming BitGo as its custodian. The crypto asset management company also changed the name of its Bitcoin Futures ETF to the Hashdex Bitcoin ETF. Hashdex’s update comes after the SEC met with representatives from some companies that applied for spot Bitcoin ETF. One of the crypto asset management […]
